commit_title: Hide Ink tab for histogram plots; add typings
commit_message: Conditionally hide the Ink Ratio tab in the side menu when the selected plotType is 'histogram' by pulling plotType from sideMenuData and rendering the tab only if not a histogram. In PlotlyHelpers, include groupSettings in the sideMenuData destructure and add explicit types for the bins.forEach callback parameters to address TypeScript typing issues. These changes prevent irrelevant UI controls for histograms and tighten typings in plot generation code.
